static_string::assign (4 of 10 overloads)

Assign count characterss starting at npos from other.

Synopsis 
template<
    std::size_t M>
static_string&
assign(
    static_string< M, CharT, Traits > const& str,
    size_type pos,
    size_type count = npos);
